prepare(waits=False, *args, **kwargs)[source]¶
Args:
waits(bool): set if running interactively (i.e. sim will wait for external actions) sim_time(int): override the simulation duration
Raises:
SystemExit on configuration error in setting log)
Returns:
Dict: {‘sim_time’:prepared sim duration (int),} This is an extensible interface that can be added to but must maintain compatibility.
